resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3094</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Do you believe in Miracles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glauben Sie an Wunder</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vous croyez aux miracles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Você acredita nos miracles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Credete nei miracoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πιστεύετε στα θαύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usted cree en milagros</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a Unit with activities which integrates use of the web on the Topic of Miracles. Includes, reading comprehendion and written expression activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Maßeinheit mit Aktivitäten, die
Gebrauch von dem Web auf dem Thema von Wundern integriert. 
Schließt ein und liest comprehendion und schriftliche Ausdruck 
Aktivitäten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une unité avec des activités qui intègre
l'utilisation du Web sur le sujet des miracles. Inclut, lisant 
le comprehendion et les activités écrites d'expression.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma unidade com atividades que integre o 
uso do Web no tópico dos miracles. Inclui, lendo o 
comprehendion e atividades escritas da expressão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'unità con le attività che integra 
l'uso del Web sul soggetto dei miracoli. Include, leggendo il 
comprehendion e le attività scritte di espressione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια μονάδα με τις δραστηριότητες που 
ενσωματώνει τη χρήση του Ιστού στο θέμα των θαυμάτων. 
Περιλαμβάνει, διαβάζοντας το comprehendion και τις γραπτές
δραστηριότητες έκφρασης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una unidad con actividades que integra 
el uso del Web en el asunto de milagros. Incluye, leyendo el 
comprehendion y actividades escritas de la expresión.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
